page_content: The page discusses the electronic billing process in healthcare through a cantonal clearinghouse.
The page discusses the shortage of skilled workers in various professions in the region of Aargau.
The page provides information on outpatient services for children and adolescents with disabilities in the canton of Aargau.
The page provides information on export certificates and guidelines for various types of goods, including food and cosmetics.
The page discusses the approval of the 2005 state budget by the KAPF, including additional funding and target adjustments.
The page provides information on driving with a mobility impairment, including the process for obtaining a learner's permit and potential vehicle modifications.
The page discusses a training course for library staff in the canton of Aargau, focusing on practical goals and improvements for libraries.
The page discusses the testing of emergency sirens in the canton of Aargau, including the schedule and types of alarms.
The page provides flood hazard maps and technical reports for various regions in the canton of Aargau.
The page offers various measures to help young people enter the workforce, including projects for job search and motivational semesters.
